img.alt: Transparency Reporting For Hamtramck Public Schools
img.title: Transparency Reporting For Hamtramck Public Schools

strong.span:
______________________________________________________
NOTICE OF SPECIAL MEETING REMOTE PARTICIPATION
Notice is hereby given that a SPECIAL MEETING of the Board of Education of the School District of the City of Hamtramck, County of Wayne, Michigan, for the month of APRIL, 2020 will be held as follows:
DATE: MONDAY, APRIL 27, 2020
TIME: 4:00 p.m. PLACE This meeting is being held electronically in accordance with the Governor’s directives in response to COVID 19, including Executive Order 2020-15.
Details regarding options for participation will be posted and there will also be opportunities for public participation in accordance with the Open Meetings Act.
Click Here for Meeting Participation Links, Participation Form, Agenda, and Other Information.
Anyone who requires special accommodations in order to access this meeting should contact the Superintendent’s Office at jmcbryar@hamtramckschools.org
PURPOSE: BOND PROPOSITION and COW MEETING Evan Major, President Hamtramck Board of Education This notice is given pursuant to Act 267, Public Acts of Michigan.
Official minutes of the Hamtramck Board of Education meetings are available for inspection at the Hamtramck Board of Education Office located at 3201 Roosevelt, during the hours of 8:00 a.m. and 3:30 p.m. Telephone (313) 872-9270. /jm

div.div: The health and well-being of our students, families and staff is of the utmost importance to all of us. With the identification of two presumptive positive cases of Coronavirus 2019 disease (COVID-19) in Michigan, along with the rapid increase in the number of cases nationwide, the level of concern continues to rise.
